author: Brian in Mesa
title: Trash
text: Release Date: October 9, 2015 (limited) Studio: Focus World MPAA Rating: R (for violence and language) Screenwriter: Richard Curtis Starring: Martin Sheen , Rooney Mara, Wagner Moura, Selton Mello Plot Summary: Based on "Trash," the acclaimed novel by British author, Andy Mulligan. "Trash" is a contemporary thriller set in the third world, and follows three boys who eke out a living picking through rubbish mounds, until a surprise discovery sets them on a breathtaking adventure pitting their wits against corruption and authority.
